document_data.name: Bardson
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Bardson''' was one of the warrior clans of [[Tethyr]]'s [[First Age of Tethyr|First Age]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Bardsons held land in the east of Tethyr.
document_data.Members: * [[Zahyra Ithal|Zahyra Bardson]], who married into [[Clan Ithal]] and became Tethyr's first court vizera.
document_data.History:
The clan was in existence from at least the time of the [[Eye Tyrant Wars]] until the [[Sixth Age of Calimshan|Age of Shoon]].

In the {{YearlinkName|-23}}, Clan Bardson allied with Clans Ithal and [[Rivarrow]] to fight against [[ogre]] tribes. They successfully removed the ogres from the lands between the [[River Ith]] and the [[Sulduskoon River]] as far east as the tip of the [[Forest of Tethir]]. The conquered territory was split among the three clans, and they built up the defenses of their new territories over the next twenty years or more.
